title: Ep 438 | Phil Explains Why the Sin of Envy Is Always Here & Jase Shares a Riddle
description:
Phil explains why envy is ever-present in the Bible and incredibly influential over people's lives — and how it can even lead to murder. Al shares a way to prevent envious thoughts and to fight against them returning. Jase shares a clever riddle, and Al discusses bitterness and how it can stunt growth and relationships. And Phil reduces it all down to the world having a problem with the very basics: Love God and love your neighbor.
